text: The Statue of Freedom is a statue of a woman that is on top of the United States Capitol. It was made in 1863 by Thomas Crawford. The woman is a symbol - she was not an actual person but stands for the idea of freedom. She is holding a shield and a laurel wreath in one hand. In the other hand, she is holding a sword that is sheathed (in its case). The statue stands on the peak of the dome, beckoning ideas and statutes that will be for the good of America and humanity. Category:Buildings and structures in Washington, D.C.
title: Statue of Freedom
